definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The dry river – bed finds no thanks for its past.
sentences.chinese: 枯竭的河牀覺得無需向豐水期表示謝意。

sentences.english: The total bacteria numbers and population of each section daring the flood period are greater than in dry season.
sentences.chinese: 各斷面的細菌總數和種屬數，都是豐水期大於枯水期。

sentences.english: A saltwater wedge may be found when the sea water encroaches on the estuary during the plentiful runoff and spring tide.
sentences.chinese: 閩江河口豐水大潮期鹽水入侵過程中可見到鹽水楔。

sentences.english: The total bacteria numbers and population of each section during the flood period are greater than in dry season.
sentences.chinese: 各斷面的細菌總數和種屬數，都是豐水期大於枯水期。

sentences.english: Diversity index of phytoplankton in flood period is higher than that in dry period.
sentences.chinese: 豐水期浮游植物多樣性指數大於平水期。

sentences.english: The system persistence time of total Hg was the longest at the period of low water and the shortest in flush time.
sentences.chinese: 總汞的在體系中滯留的時間枯水期最長，豐水期最短。
